name: Proyectos Paintones
description: Group Full Stack project that allows you add and display project cards with static detail views.

name: Rick & Morty Character Finder
description: React Front-End project to search and find characters of the show by name and species.

name: Anime Finder
description: JavaScript Vanilla Front-End project to search and find anime shows, add them to your favorite list, and remove them.

name: Library Gestion API
description: Express JS CRUD API for library management. The project includes a small static view to list the books of the database.
